#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType PointOfInterest.

== Name ==

*[CPointOfInterest PointOfInterest]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--PointOfInterest (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Point of interest on a golf course.
			A point of interest contains a name, the coordinate of the point, a specification of its type limited to a list
			of valid values, and an optional orientation in respect to the point.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  number = xs:nonNegativeInteger  orientation = [SOrientationEnum OrientationEnum]  other = xs:string  subtype = xs:string  type = [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum]>  (name? ; description? ; [CPosition position]) </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || description ||  					Description of a point of interest.				 ||
|| xs:string || name ||  					Name of point of interest.				 ||
|| [CPosition golfml:Position] || [CPosition position] ||  					Coordinate of a point of interest.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| number ||   || xs:nonNegativeInteger || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| orientation ||   || [SOrientationEnum golfml:OrientationEnum] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| other ||  				Alternate value for an attribute.			 || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| subtype ||   || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| type ||   || [SGolfCourseAreaTypeEnum golfml:GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPlacemarks Placemarks]
----
    <xs:complexType name="PointOfInterest">  <xs:all>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="description" type="xs:string">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="position" type="golfml:Position">    </xs:element>  </xs:all>  <xs:attribute name="number" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger"/>  <xs:attribute name="type" type="golfml:GolfCourseAreaTypeEnum"/>  <xs:attribute name="subtype" type="xs:string"/>  <xs:attribute name="orientation" type="golfml:OrientationEnum"/>  <xs:attributeGroup ref="golfml:Other"/></xs:complexType>
----
